snippet: A Hollywood Hills homeowner whose fire code violations ended in a deadly blaze pleaded no contest to involuntary manslaughter and was given a one-year jail term.
abstract: Gerhard Albert Becker, German architect and Hollywood Hills homeowner whose fire code violations ended in 2011 blaze that led to death of firefighter Glenn Allen, pleads no contest to involuntary manslaughter and is given one-year jail term; he will be deported to Germany
lead_paragraph: A Hollywood Hills homeowner whose fire code violations ended in a deadly blaze pleaded no contest to involuntary manslaughter and was given a one-year jail term.

headline.main: Architect’s Sentence in Death of Firefighter Angers Fire Crews
